# Tool Cutting Speed

> **Skill ID:** `prism-tool-speed`
> **Category:** TOOL
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Surface speed calculations

## Capabilities

- Calculate and validate tool cutting speed

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in tool cutting speed.
